com.sorcix.sirc

Interface MessageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IrcAdaptor

    public interface MessageListener
    Notified of new IRC messages.
    Author:
    Sorcix
    See Also:
    IrcConnection.addMessageListener(MessageListener), IrcConnection.removeMessageListener(MessageListener)

    • Method Detail

      • onAction

        void onAction(IrcConnection irc,
            User sender,
            Channel target,
            String action)
        Received an action in a channel.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        sender - The user who sent the action.
        target - The channel the action was sent to.
        action - The action message.

      • onAction

        void onAction(IrcConnection irc,
            User sender,
            String action)
        Received a private action.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        sender - The user who sent the action.
        action - The action message.

      • onCtcpReply

        void onCtcpReply(IrcConnection irc,
               User sender,
               String command,
               String message)
        Received a CTCP reply. Note that this event is only fired when receiving CTCP replies supported by sIRC. If you can't send a CTCP request, you won't get the reply.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        sender - The user sending this CTCP reply.
        command - The CTCP command. (PONG, CLIENTINFO, ...)
        message - The CTCP message.
        See Also:
        User.sendCtcpClientInfo(), User.sendCtcpPing(), User.sendCtcpVersion()

      • onMessage

        void onMessage(IrcConnection irc,
             User sender,
             Channel target,
             String message)
        Received a message in a channel.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        sender - The user who sent the message.
        target - The channel the message was sent to.
        message - The message.
